description:
Stiff boots for driving big skis. These burly alpine touring boots offer fantastic downhill performance thanks to a one-two punch of power and precision. 130 Flex uses a simple, yet effective tongue with 2 layers that lock into one another in ski mode and move freely when in tour mode. The carbon reinforced cuff adds even more stiffness for maximum power transfer.

  • Shell has a compact lower made of ultra-lightweight Pebax
  • V-shaped cuff is made of eco-friendly Pebax Rnew with carbon infusion
  • Ultralon foam liner is thermoformable and provides more warmth and comfort when charging hard
  • 4 EZ-Tech aluminum buckles are micro-adjustable for a perfect fit
  • Power Strap® helps further increase the stiffness of the boot
  • EZ Flex double tongue uses interlocking layers to promote flexibility when walking and stiffness when skiing
  • 63° range of motion for climbing and 12-14° of forward lean for skiing
  • Ski/Walk mechanism is easy to operate, even with gloves on
  • Vibram V-lug soles blend grip and durability
  • Speed step-in locator on sole allows fast positioning into bindings
  • Compatible with tech and alpine touring bindings
name: La Sportiva Vanguard Ski Boots - Unisex
